name: krissmass
description:
It's krissmass, and so your mission to collect various Swedish culinary christmas items has begun. However, you've been faced with quite a problem: the dishes have been hidden beneath the christmas trees! Employing naught but your trusted äxe,  you must slay these trees, and take back the dishes you require for survival. Will you succeed, or are you doomed to perish in the ever-changing forest you somehow found yourself in?

Features

* Barely intelligible graphics

* Tedious & Repetitive Gameplay

* No soundtrack or audio whatsoever

* A solid 30 frames per second

Gain as many points as you can by destroying those pesky trees, and try to simultaneously ease your hunger for christmas food so that you may persevere.

Credits

In game font: C Web by NoFont
